headline: Amazon’s US$50b OpenAI Deal Recasts AWS And Valuation Story
summary: Amazon.com (NasdaqGS:AMZN) announces a $50 billion investment and technology partnership with OpenAI. Amazon Web Services will become the exclusive cloud provider for OpenAI's enterprise platform. The agreement includes a multibillion dollar expansion of their cloud alliance and jointly developed AI tools and infrastructure. This move ties Amazon more tightly to one of the highest profile AI model developers while reinforcing Amazon Web Services as a core part of the company story. For...

headline: Global earnings show shift from US as S&P 500 slumped
summary: While profits boomed in the US, the rest of the world wasn’t shabby either, undergirding calls to diversify away from American stocks into megacaps in Asia and Europe.  Asia’s behemoths continued to benefit from their key role in the artificial intelligence build out, while European consumer companies remained under pressure.

headline: Consumer Tech News (Feb 23-27): US–Taiwan Trade Tensions Escalates, Amazon Invests $12B In US & More
summary: Mark Kelly emphasized the rapid workplace impact of artificial intelligence and called for "practical rules" that protect families while preserving innovation. U.S.–Taiwan trade tensions escalated after the Supreme Court struck down former President Donald Trump's emergency tariff authority. Trump responded by criticizing Taiwan's semiconductor dominance and proposing new tariffs.

headline: Will Chewy’s New CFO Tilt CHWY’s Strategy Toward Cost Discipline Over Growth Investment?
summary: On February 23, 2026, Chewy appointed Christopher S. Deppe as Chief Financial Officer and principal financial officer, formalizing the transition from interim finance leadership. Deppe’s background leading cost optimization and complex logistics finance at Amazon and Chewy suggests a stronger emphasis on operational discipline in Chewy’s finance function. We’ll now examine how Deppe’s Amazon-honed cost optimization expertise could influence Chewy’s existing investment narrative and future...
